page.title: 11SHOPS IN HILLSBOROUGH
page.content: The shops are clustered around the junction of Holme Lane, Bradfield Road, Langsett Road and Middlewood Road. They consist of a variety of smaller shops with three supermarkets. Most of the local people shop here for their weekly goods and use the city centre shops for any special purchases. The area is well served by buses which enable people from outside the area to use the shopping facilities. The rows of shops stretch for a considerable distance along Holme Lane, Middlewood Road and Langsett Road, in fact, stretching on Infirmary Road almost to West Bar. The area has many corner shops, and Upperthorpe has its own small shopping centre consisting of about twenty shops.
